DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind study , randomize , control , crossover . Study recruit 30 volunteer stable asthma age 8-18 year . Participants perform lung function part routine follow-up receive Foradil 12mcg either Aerolizer ( standard dry powder inhaler ) Inspiromatic ( active , breath synchronize innovative inhaler ) . 3-60 day later participant receive drug inhaler . Pre post treatment ( 15 min , 30 min , 60 min ) Lung function result , drug level blood , vital sign side effect record .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Inspiromatic Inhaler Comparison Aerolizer Inhaler When Delivering Formoterol
DOC.criteria: Children 818 year Asthma 50 < FEV1 < 80 Can perform Spirometry Poor cooperation Pregnancy Milk Allergy Other lung disease Prior familiarity Aerolizer
